title: 2012–13 Port Vila Premier League
text:
The 2012–13 <a href="TVL%20Premier%20League">TVL Premier League</a> or 2012–13 <a href="Port%20Vila%20Premier%20League">Port Vila Premier League</a> is the 19th season of the <a href="Port%20Vila">Port Vila</a> Premier League top division.
The top three of the league qualify for the <a href="2013%20VFF%20National%20Super%20League">2013 VFF National Super League</a>.
The season lasted from September 13 to December 12, 2012.
<a href="Amicale%20F.C.">Amicale FC</a> were the champions and <a href="Seveners%20United">Seveners United</a> relegated to the <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20TVL%20First%20Division">2013–14 TVL First Division</a>.
Standings.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
